nodes.text: Alpha Flight was a Galactic Republic starfighter squadron that participated in the Clone Wars. Circa 21 BBY, Alpha Flight accompanied the Republic flotilla Strike Force Cularin on a mission to attack a Confederacy of Independent Systems base in the Ando system. On arrival in the system, the Republic task force engaged a Separatist Corellian corvette. Alpha Flight flew over to the corvette and opened fire on it, causing the ship to explode.
